description: React component defining a Modal UI element with customizable size, title, actions, and close functionality.

methods.name: Modal({ show, onClose, title, children, actions, size = "md" })
methods.description: Functional React component rendering a modal dialog with conditional display based on 'show' prop.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^function Modal({ show, onClose, title, children, actions, size = "md" }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ show, onClose, title, children, actions, size = "md" })
